value.query: Select Id, QuoteId, Quote.Account.Situs_State_Abbrev__c,Quote.Opportunity.CloseDate,ParentQuoteLineItem__c, Quote.GroupNumber__r.Date_Migrated_to_WGS__c,Quote.GroupNumber__r.IsPartOfAMigration__c, Quote.GroupNumber__r.ClaimSystem__c,Product2Id, Product2.Name, Product2.Bundle__c, Funding__c,Product_Type__c, Financing__c, Subscribers__c, Reason__c, ProductStage__c, Probability__c, Members__c, RecordType__c, CompletionMarker__c, ProductLineApprovalStatus__c, Cards_Display_Approvals__c, Cards_Product_Config_Action_Name__c, CurrentMembers__c, CurrentSubscribers__c, LoggedInUserProfile__c, AHGProductLineReadyforApproval__c, IHMProductLineReadyforApproval__c, CCMUProductLineReadyforApproval__c, ANACustomNetworksReadyForApproval__c, OnsiteClinicsProductLineReadyforAp__c, ProductName__c From QuoteLineItem Where QuoteId = '{{parent.obj.Id}}' and ParentQuoteLineItem__c = null Order By ProductName__c ASC
